original_response.translation_text: Artificial intelligence, also known as intellectuals, robotic intelligence, refers to the intelligence expressed by machines made by human beings. Artificial intelligence is usually the technology to present human intelligence through normal computer programs. It also indicates whether, and how, such intelligence systems can be realized. And, through advances in medicine, neuroscience, robotics, and statistics, it is commonly predicted that many human careers are being replaced.

standardized_response.text: Artificial intelligence, also known as intellectuals, robotic intelligence, refers to the intelligence expressed by machines made by human beings. And, through advances in medicine, neuroscience, robotics, and statistics, it is commonly predicted that many human careers are being replaced.
